translations: n.羊驼；羊驼呢；羊驼毛棉混纺织物；德国银（等于 alpacca）

phrs.translation: 羊驼, 羊驼毛, 阿尔巴卡, 阿尔帕卡
阿尔帕卡毛, 羊驼绒, 羊驼毛, 驼羊毛
阿尔帕卡原色毛纱, 高档羊驼毛线, 阿尔帕卡绉, 阿尔帕卡毛
羽绸伞, 阿尔帕卡人丝绸

sentences.sentence: Working with the sample above, what happens when you want to produce output using only the alpaca map?
sentences.translation: 使用上面的示例，如果想只使用羊驼地图生成输出，会发生什么情况呢？

sentences.sentence: Pianezzi, who said he has competed at the Dog Surfing World Championships, came up with the idea of surfing with an alpaca.
sentences.translation: 曾参加过世界狗狗冲浪锦标赛的Pianezzi萌生了与羊驼一起冲浪的想法。

sentences.sentence: Llama and alpaca farmers have been badly hit by recurring water shortages.
sentences.translation: 大羊驼和羊驼养殖者受到反复出现的水资源短缺的严重打击。
